Uses of Interface
hms.command.Command

Packages that use Command
hms.command hms.command contains a set of utility commands for hotel management purposes 
hms.gui hms.gui contains classes that model the system's graphical user interface 
 

Uses of Command in hms.command
 

Classes in hms.command that implement Command
 class CheckInCommand
          The Class CheckInCommand encapsulates the functions for checking-in purposes.
 class CheckOutCommand
          The Class CheckOutCommand encapsulates the functions for checking-out purposes.
 class ManageRoomCommand
          The Class ManageRoomCommand provides functions to manage room rate and discounts.
 class SearchCommand
          The Class SearchCommand encapsulates functions for searching check-in/check-out records.
 

Uses of Command in hms.gui
 

Methods in hms.gui that return Command
 Command UI.getCurrentCommand()
           
 

Methods in hms.gui with parameters of type Command
 javax.swing.JPanel TableView.accept(Command command)
          Accept a command.
 

Constructors in hms.gui with parameters of type Command
CheckInPanel(Command cmd, HotelManager hm)
          Instantiates a new check in panel.
CheckOutPanel(Command cmd, HotelManager hm)
          Instantiates a new check out panel.
ManageRoomPanel(Command cmd, HotelManager hm)
          Instantiates a new manage room panel.
SearchPanel(Command cmd)
          Instantiates a new search panel.
